resources.string:
"Refresh the current weather by touching the weather image.

Adjust system operating temperature up and down by touching the Adjust Up or Adjust Down buttons.

Change system mode and fan operation by touching your preferred selections.

"Displays ten day forecast. Drag the view right and left to view the whole forecast.

Select a day's weather image to view a detailed forecast.

Adjust your current location in the Settings menu.

"Start by selecting the Time Interval that you would like the temperature and fan settings to change.

Next, press the button labeled 'Select Mode' to choose your temperature and fan settings.

Insert the Mode selection into the schedule by selecting 'Insert'.
"This graph displays the energy usage.\n\nPress a button on the left to change the time frame of the energy usage graph
